Uses of Package
se350.afifsohaili.gameframework

  • Classes in se350.afifsohaili.gameframework used by se350.afifsohaili.gameframework 
    Class and Description
    Data
    A wrapper for the data inside each tile.
    Grid
    Stores data for each tiles.
    Mechanics
    Mechanics is the glue that holds all classes together.
    Mechanics is responsible for loading options from the options.ini file.
    Options
    A class that stores the application's options.
    The Options class automatically generate two options on constructor call: The number of horizontal tiles in the grid The number of vertical tiles in the grid. Both options can be overriden through the options.ini file.
    UserInterface
    This interface provides the method signatures that are used by Mechanics class to start the game and update the UserInterface.
